code: export const subTotal=(id,price)=>{let subTotalCost=0;let carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(item=>{if(item.id===id){subTotalCost=item.quantitiy*price;}});return subTotalCost;};export const quantity=id=>{let product=0;let carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(item=>{if(item.id===id){product=item.quantitiy;}});return product;};export const totalCost=()=>{let totalCost=0;let carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));carts.forEach(item=>{totalCost+=item.quantitiy*item.price;});return totalCost;};
